title: syscall.Wait4: the actually system call seems to be depreciated
body:
by **satyajit@studiomarch.com**: 
OS: Linux
Go Version: 1.3

The man pages of wait4 describes it as being obsolete:

    These functions are obsolete; use waitpid(2) or waitid(2) in  new  programs

Should this be updated in the newer versions to waitpid/waitid?
